description: Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) (s.73) drawings of planning application Ref 166627LBC dated 15/02/2017 for 'Internal alterations including relocation of internal walls raising of suspended ceilings; installation of radiators; restoration of fireplace; Installation of bathroom and kitchen furniture; refurbishment of existing windows; Replacement of two windows, one pair of French doors and one front door in existing openings (Listed Building Consent)'. Variation seeking to install single glazed French Doors.
decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the 15/02/2017.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Design & Access Statement December 2016, Heritage Statement December 2016 Project Ref.: 940-03, Proposed Drawings 2120-02 date 20.12.2016 and 2120-sk01 dated 13.04.2017

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the works permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy 7C of the adopted Ealing Development Management Development Plan, policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy 2012 and policy 7.8 of the London Plan (2016) | All other external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing building and be in accordance with the details indicated on the application form and approved plans.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
